channel.title: Project Forsaken-Fury
channel.description:
[center][b]Base:[/b] Project Insanity [b]Client Base:[/b] SlashScape 474 [b]Programmers:[/b] Kelly15 (Me), Requeim (from r-s), looking for 2 or one more [b]Forums:[/b] Forsaken-Fury (Will be a vBulletin) [b]Uptime:[/b] Will host on a VPS Server as soon as get donators. [b]Client Download Link:[/b] (Will post soon) [b]Webclient:[/b] (Will post soon) [b] XP Rate:[/b] 750 exp per hit (will change soon)
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/o5qcro.jpg[/img] Kellu15 (Client/Server Development) 1pure1337 (Server Development) Requeim (Client/Server Development) ImbWeedz (Forum Developer/Maker)
[b] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2d7xbwh.jpg[/img] Why Forsaken-Fury?[/b] As our Project Insanity base gives us the great stability features it offers and my dedicated server gives us an edge, with PKing as perfect as possible this is the server for you, with everything from skilling to combat to merchanting to dueling to bosses having a great time.
[b]Features:[/b]
No customs * Active user base * All 474 Emotes/GFX/Anims * Real Combat Based Slayer Tasks * Crafting: All crafting works except glass blowing and hard leather(will be done soon) * Fishing: 40% Fixing the system soon * Herblore: 100% * Mining: 100% * Smithing: 80% with interfaces * Runecrafting: I would say about 70%, but theres a lot that needs to be done * Fletching: 100% * Woodcutting: 100% * Agility: 30%(Not started) * Farming: 100% (All features) * Cooking: 100%(All features) * Thieving: 90%(Need to fix a few stall) * Firemaking: 75%(Need to add clipped walking to this) * Full godsword stances * Full weapon poisoning * All dupes fixed
[b]Dueling:[/b]
Yep, there's dueling on the server, like many previous sources do have. There are no bugs so far with the current dueling system and the Forsaken-Fury players are seeming to enjoy it. There's just not much to say, when it works, it works.
Skills are being completed soon, and once skills are completed I believe the server will be near perfection.
If you want to be a programmer, client developer, or forums maker please post here and I will get to you.
Also when the server is released/project done we will be looking for moderators.
[img]http://i48.tinypic.com/krksk.jpg[/img]
[b]Melee (Perfect):[/b] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/29ftus7.gif[/img]
[b]Range (Perfect):[/b] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2lsy35y.gif[/img]
[b]Mage (Perfect):[/b] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/eb62dj.gif[/img] [b] If you would like to apply use this format: [/b] [code]Name: How old are you?: What are you applying for?: Any previous experience in this role?: MSN Contact Information?:[/code][/center]
[center][size=14pt][u][b]Update Log[/b][/u][/size] Fixed agility a little. Made webclient. Started on forums. Fixed all dupes. Added warrior guild base (40%). Fixed ugly money color. (Client-sided) Fixed animations (server-sided) Fixed maps. (client-sided)[/center]

item.title: Project Forsaken-Fury
item.dc:creator: @kelly15 kelly15
item.description:
@kelly15 wrote:

[center]Base: Project Insanity
Client Base: SlashScape 474
Programmers: Kelly15 (Me), Requeim (from r-s), looking for 2 or one more
Forums: Forsaken-Fury (Will be a vBulletin)
Uptime: Will host on a VPS Server as soon as get donators.
Client Download Link: (Will post soon)
Webclient: (Will post soon)

XP Rate: 750 exp per hit (will change soon)


Kellu15 (Client/Server Development)
1pure1337 (Server Development)
Requeim (Client/Server Development)
ImbWeedz (Forum Developer/Maker)



Why Forsaken-Fury? As our Project Insanity base gives us the great stability features it offers and my dedicated server gives us an edge, with PKing as perfect as possible this is the server for you, with everything from skilling to combat to merchanting to dueling to bosses having a great time.

Features:

No customs
* Active user base
* All 474 Emotes/GFX/Anims
* Real Combat Based Slayer Tasks
* Crafting: All crafting works except glass blowing and hard leather(will be done soon)
* Fishing: 40% Fixing the system soon
* Herblore: 100%
* Mining: 100%
* Smithing: 80% with interfaces
* Runecrafting: I would say about 70%, but theres a lot that needs to be done
* Fletching: 100%
* Woodcutting: 100%
* Agility: 30%(Not started)
* Farming: 100% (All features)
* Cooking: 100%(All features)
* Thieving: 90%(Need to fix a few stall)
* Firemaking: 75%(Need to add clipped walking to this)
* Full godsword stances
* Full weapon poisoning
* All dupes fixed

Dueling:

Yep, there’s dueling on the server, like many previous sources do have. There are no bugs so far with the current dueling system and the Forsaken-Fury players are seeming to enjoy it. There’s just not much to say, when it works, it works.

Skills are being completed soon, and once skills are completed I believe the server will be near perfection.

If you want to be a programmer, client developer, or forums maker please post here and I will get to you.

Also when the server is released/project done we will be looking for moderators.

Melee (Perfect):

Range (Perfect):

2lsy35y.gif799×584

Mage (Perfect):


If you would like to apply use this format:

Name: How old are you?: What are you applying for?: Any previous experience in this role?: MSN Contact Information?:[/center]

[center][size=14pt]Update Log[/size]
Fixed agility a little.
Made webclient.
Started on forums.
Fixed all dupes.
Added warrior guild base (40%).
Fixed ugly money color. (Client-sided)
Fixed animations (server-sided)
Fixed maps. (client-sided)[/center]

Read full topic
